project(tinyexr LANGUAGES C)

add_library(miniz STATIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/miniz/miniz.c)
target_include_directories(miniz PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/miniz)

add_library(tinyexr INTERFACE)
target_link_libraries(tinyexr INTERFACE miniz)
target_include_directories(tinyexr INTERFACE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})
